text: Mba Zisas phorga ruigi gumgi mba tugen kim, Zisas mba tugen mben hɨgi, mbe khaŋ ana nzuai, “Nza Guma Bakɨme gangi.” Tomas khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Gu maaŋ muuŋgip mbe ana faramborani ndi tɨga fukfugi thooni gangip, gu wo farafen ana fukfugi thoorir suirav, mbe fugar ana kuvsɨgeŋ dagi thooŋ, gu wo farve mba thoon rugɨrga, gu nde nzuai kameŋ khothɨgɨrga. Gu ntige nde khothɨgi fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara!”
